resources.string: This app needs to be able to locate players in order to be playable. Please click OK to give access to your location. If you refuse, Campus Capture won\'t be playable and will close.
Campus Capture will not work without having access to precise location

Welcome to Campus Capture, the fun game where you and your section compete against the other sections to see who can occupy the most buildings on campus!

 The rules are simple: 
 

The map shows you all the zones on campus and who they belong to 


A take-over is the time during which zones can be attacked and defended 


Take-overs span the first 15 minutes of every hour 


During every take-over, go to the zone you wish to attack or defend and press the button 


The section with the most players in the same zone captures it 


You can check the number of players attacking a given zone by tapping on it 


Zones award different amounts of points depending on how desirable they are 


Every day, you will receive a certain amount of points to spend on power-ups 


You can choose yourself how many of your points you're willing to spend for a given power-up 


If enough points come together, the power-up goes into effect; otherwise, the points are refunded 


Collaborate with your teammates to buy power-ups together to make your section stronger 


Follow the total amount of points your section has accumulated under the scoreboard tab 


If you need help, invite your friends to join you in your effort under the '…' in the top right corner 
 

Have fun and good luck!
By accepting those terms of service you agree that your data will be collected and used for non-legal activities such as DDoS-ing, Botting and…
Hey there, I need help defending our faculty\'s territory in Campus Capture!\nCome join me now:\u00A0
Enter your email address and you will receive a mail
Please select the faculty you want to fight for!
